text: Paul Omo Mukairu (born 18 January 2000) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays as a forward for Anderlecht on loan from Antalyaspor. ==Club career== Mukairu made his professional debut in a 1–0 Süper Lig win over Göztepe S.K. on 18 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:People from Abuja Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Antalyaspor footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:Nigerian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Turkey
title: Paul Mukairu
